name: AppViewXCertificateAutomation
0: ”Alexa, open a. v. x. certificate automation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. v. x. certificate automation
des: This Skill helps you to retrieve the list of all expired SSL certificates installed on the managed devices on AppViewX device inventory. The skill will respond with the total count of expired certificates and an email with the certificate report will be sent to appveiwxgs@gmail.com
